name: Sessions
description: Management of session used by other plugins.

SESSIONS_SECRET.help: Secret used to encrypt sessions variables for storing data related to challenges.
SESSIONS_SECRET.label: Sessions secret

SESSIONS_NAME.help: Name of the cookie given to clients.
SESSIONS_NAME.label: Sessions name

SESSIONS_IDLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) of inactivity before the session is invalidated.
SESSIONS_IDLING_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions idling timeout

SESSIONS_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session must be renewed.
SESSIONS_ROLLING_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions rolling timeout

SESSIONS_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.help: Maximum time (in seconds) before a session is destroyed.
SESSIONS_ABSOLUTE_TIMEOUT.label: Sessions absolute timeout

SESSIONS_CHECK_IP.help: Destroy session if IP address is different than original one.
SESSIONS_CHECK_IP.label: Sessions check IP

SESSIONS_CHECK_USER_AGENT.help: Destroy session if User-Agent is different than original one.
SESSIONS_CHECK_USER_AGENT.label: Sessions check User-Agent
